diff_hunk:
@@ -7287,6 +7287,15 @@ def fn(x):
         with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "operation failed in interpreter"):
             fn(torch.tensor(4))
 
+    def test_trace_contiguous(self):
+        def foo(x):
+            return x[:, :, ::2].view(12).contiguous()
body: Actually, the concrete issue re ran into was there was code of the form `.contiguous().view(...)` and it would fail in the interpreter because the call to `contiguous()` was not recorded in the trace. Maybe I'll just switch it to that
